defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the progress bar when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the progress bar.

formatOptions.description: The options to use for formatting the value.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; track: string; label: string; circle: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the progress bar. Useful for composition.

locale.description: The locale to use for formatting the value.

max.description: The maximum allowed value of the progress bar.

min.description: The minimum allowed value of the progress bar.

onValueChange.description: Callback fired when the value changes.

value.description: The controlled value of the progress bar.
